name: Destiny Drawer
description:
This is the game prototype "Destiny Drawer" Where you play as an abandoned drawing with the magic powers of a "Bouncy Brush"... The line you make behind you you can turn around and jump on! Go through the "Painting Portal" and see how high you can go! The world is your Canvas! 

Created at the University of Waterloo Game Jam. Team Members:

Game Design and Art: Jonathan B.
Programming Magic: Kyle S. 

Art and Voice Acting: Vincent V.

If you make it to the last level, comment with your personal best!
